description: Protect your precious iPad Mini screen and have Glare and Fingerprint Protection with the Infinite Products PhotonShield. High quality Anti-Glare, and now Anti-Fingerprint PhotonShields will protect your iPad Mini screen from scratches, scrapes, dust, and those pesky streaks left behind from your fingers. With 2 in the pack, you can share with friends, or keep some for later.
title: Infinite Products PhotonShield Anti-Glare and Anti-Fingerprint Screen Protector Film for iPad mini - 2 Pack (IP00701_F)
